Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on his friendship with people related to him: Ichihara Uichiro, Tomita Tokichi (Tomoko Naraoka), Fujiwara Yoshie (Mineko Takanezawa) and Hagiwara Sakutaro, it depicts the life that has never been written as a comedy.
